SELECT no, title, contents, DATE_FORMAT(create_date, '%d/%m/%Y %H:%i') AS create_date, DATE_FORMAT(modify_date, '%d/%m/%Y %H:%i') AS modify_date FROM board WHERE no = #{no}
mapper.insert: INSERT into board(title, contents, create_date, modify_date) VALUES(#{boardModel.title}, #{boardModel.contents}, now(), now())
